testcase.name: To validate the booking details functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is in adactin login page.........................................passed When User enter valid username and password.................................passed And User click login button.................................................passed Given User is in adactin booking details page...............................passed When user select "Sydney" and "Hotel Creek" and "Standard" and "1 - One" and "1 - One" and "1 - One".passed And user select the required hotel and click continue.......................passed And user enter the "arun" and "balaaji" and "dadas" and "1234567891234567" select"American Express" and "January" and "2022" and "123" click book now.passed Then user in booking confirmation page......................................passed

testcase.name: To validate the booking details functionality 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is in adactin login page.........................................passed When User enter valid username and password.................................passed And User click login button.................................................passed Given User is in adactin booking details page...............................passed When user select "Melbourne" and "Hotel Sunshine" and "Double" and "2 - Two" and "2 - Two" and "2 - Two".passed And user select the required hotel and click continue.......................passed And user enter the "bala" and "arun" and "asdfa" and "7894561230123456" select"VISA" and "February" and "2022" and "345" click book now.passed Then user in booking confirmation page......................................passed
